propDescriptions.action: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports focusVisible() action.
propDescriptions.centerRipple: If true, the ripples are centered. They won't start at the cursor interaction position.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.disableHighlightToday: If true, today's date is rendering without highlighting with circle.
propDescriptions.disableMargin: If true, days are rendering without margin. Useful for displaying linked range of days.
propDescriptions.disableRipple:
If true, the ripple effect is disabled.
⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the .Mui-focusVisible class.
propDescriptions.disableTouchRipple: If true, the touch ripple effect is disabled.
propDescriptions.focusRipple: If true, the base button will have a keyboard focus ripple.
propDescriptions.focusVisibleClassName: This prop can help identify which element has keyboard focus. The class name will be applied when the element gains the focus through keyboard interaction. It's a polyfill for the CSS :focus-visible selector. The rationale for using this feature is explained here. A polyfill can be used to apply a focus-visible class to other components if needed.
propDescriptions.isEndOfHighlighting: Set to true if the day is the end of a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isEndOfPreviewing: Set to true if the day is the start of a previewing date range.
propDescriptions.isHighlighting: Set to true if the day is in a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isPreviewing: Set to true if the day is in a preview date range.
propDescriptions.isStartOfHighlighting: Set to true if the day is the start of a highlighted date range.
propDescriptions.isStartOfPreviewing: Set to true if the day is the end of a previewing date range.
propDescriptions.isVisuallySelected: Indicates if the day should be visually selected.
propDescriptions.onFocusVisible: Callback fired when the component is focused with a keyboard. We trigger a onFocus callback too.
propDescriptions.outsideCurrentMonth: If true, day is outside of month and will be hidden.
propDescriptions.showDaysOutsideCurrentMonth:
If true, days outside the current month are rendered:
- if fixedWeekNumber is defined, renders days to have the weeks requested.
- if fixedWeekNumber is not defined, renders day to fill the first and last week of the current month.
- ignored if calendars equals more than 1 on range pickers.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.touchRippleRef: A ref that points to the TouchRipple element.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

rangeIntervalDayPreviewStart.conditions: isStartOfPreviewing=true or day is the start of the month

rangeIntervalDayPreviewEnd.conditions: isEndOfPreviewing=true or day is the end of the month
